hyperaggregate.client.utils package¶

Submodules¶

hyperaggregate.client.utils.aggregation_model_queue module¶

class hyperaggregate.client.utils.aggregation_model_queue.AggregationModelQueue(participants)¶

Bases: object

Stores models for participants and implements logic for easy handling of these models

add(participant, model)¶

Adds model for given participant. If it already has model for this participant or if participant is not in the list of participants for this model queue then exception ValueError is risen

Parameters

  • participant (str) – Identifier of the participant (presumably address)

  • model (object) – Model to store for the given participant

Raises

ValueError – Participant is not in the specified list in the constructor or there is already a model set for the given participant

get()¶

Get’s a model from queue

Raises

queue.Empty – no model is available and no model can be received anymore

Returns

Next model from the queue

Return type

object

is_empty()¶

Returns true if models from all participants are received and there is no model in queue to be retrieved. False is returned otherwise.

Return type

bool

hyperaggregate.client.utils.partial_model_message module¶

class hyperaggregate.client.utils.partial_model_message.PartialModelMessage(aggregation_id, group_id, model)¶

Bases: object

Message wrapper around partial share of model for given group

Variables

  • aggregation_id – Identifier for aggregation that this message is part of

  • group_id – Identifier of the aggregation group inside which the message is sent

  • model – Model

Module contents¶

Client-side helper functionality
